{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#伊藤彩沙##伊藤彩沙2019生诞祭#剥开角色的外衣，你并不属于情绪外显的人。即使从你还是某四个侦探的后辈时就看着你，也不敢说多么懂你。
那个天生的偶像，那个职业婴儿，竟然可以这样歌唱、这样舞蹈、这样打斗的吗？不再只想把你当作溺爱就够了的“妹妹”，有时也会选择远观，欣赏你的歌唱。
也许从不同的距离出发，会更好地认识你吧。
ayasa，生日快乐🎂","id":32544206,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1200,"img_size":108.51,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/e4d4fd9c19548e58d06d9bfdda2abd82c5540a0c.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":900},{"img_height":1442,"img_size":404.63,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/29bef7607f8464ce30c3af81ecfb3917d7c4a1c2.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":900,"img_size":82.11,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/b3b78a05d6e0cab10700dbb5ab308a3ab6f7178b.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1200}],"pictures_count":3,"reply":71,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1566015069},"user":{"head_url":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
